policies.description: Used to configure IPsec security services

sequence-number.description: This attribute configures the sequence number that identifies the ISAKMP policy.

diffie-hellman-group.description: This attribute configures IPsec Diffie Hellman Group for ISAKMP policy.

lifetime.description: This attribute configures IPsec lifetime for ISAKMP policy.

ike-version.description: This attribute configures IKE version for ISAKMP policy.

encryption.description: This attribute configures IPsec Encryption algorithm for ISAKMP policy.

name.description: Use this command to configure interface ipsec tunnel name. This name start with prefix 'ipsec' and a number index as sulfix, an example is 'ipsec2'.

destination.description: This attribute configures the tunnel destination address.
